function.name: remember_event
function.description: Store a new memory or event into the long-term memory system. Use this when the user shares important information, preferences, or task progress that should be remembered for future conversations.

importance.description: Importance level from 1 (low) to 5 (high). Default is 3.

function.name: recall_context
function.description: Search for relevant past memories or context based on a query. Use this before answering questions that might depend on previous knowledge.

query.description: The search query to find relevant memories.

top_k.description: Number of results to return. Default is 5.

function.name: sync_memory
function.description: Force synchronization of memory files to the vector index. Use this if the user indicates that files have been manually modified.
